title: Eat Vegan for a Week
description: Commit to eating only plant-based meals for one week to reduce carbon footprint.

title: Recycle Household Waste
description: Separate and recycle plastics, paper, and glass from your home waste for a week.

title: Use Public Transport
description: Avoid using a personal car for a week and rely on buses, trains, or trams.

title: Plant a Tree
description: Plant at least one tree in your garden or local area to help offset carbon emissions.

title: Use Rainwater for Plants
description: Collect and use rainwater for watering your plants instead of tap water for a week.

title: Avoid Single-Use Plastics
description: Say no to single-use plastic bags, bottles, and straws for one week.

title: Bike to Work or School
description: Use a bicycle instead of motorized transport for commuting this week.

title: Start Composting
description: Collect organic kitchen waste and create compost for your garden.

title: Reduce Water Usage
description: Limit your shower time to 5 minutes and turn off taps when not needed.

title: Switch to LED Bulbs
description: Replace incandescent bulbs with energy-efficient LED bulbs at home.

title: Donate Old Clothes
description: Give away clothes you no longer use instead of throwing them away.

title: Shop Locally
description: Buy food and products from local farmers and shops to reduce transportation emissions.

title: Use Reusable Bags
description: Use reusable shopping bags for all your purchases this week.

title: Participate in a Clean-Up
description: Join a local park or beach clean-up event.

title: Switch to Eco-Friendly Detergents
description: Use biodegradable and eco-friendly cleaning products at home.

title: Reduce Meat Consumption
description: Eat vegetarian meals for at least 3 days this week.

title: Install Water-Saving Devices
description: Install low-flow taps and showerheads to reduce water usage.

title: Use Public Recycling Bins
description: Properly dispose of recyclables in public bins when outside.

title: Avoid Fast Fashion
description: Refrain from buying non-essential clothing from fast-fashion brands this week.

title: Use Solar-Powered Devices
description: Charge small devices using solar power or renewable energy.
